alert.note: Alert for Eastern Addison; Eastern Rutland; Orange; Western Addison; Western Rutland; Western Windsor (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 12 at 10:50PM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Essex, western Orange, southern Addison, Rutland and northwestern Windsor Counties through 1130 PM EDT... At 1049 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Huletts Landing, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Rutland, Castleton, Sudbury, Salisbury, Rutland City, Middletown Springs, Wallingford, Mt. Holly, Orwell, Rutland - Southern Vermont Airport, Rochester, Benson, Poultney, Chittenden, Fair Haven, Clarendon, West Rutland, Whiting, Ira, and Goshen. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Addison; Eastern Rutland; Orange; Western Addison; Western Rutland; Western Windsor
